name: Fantasy Amusement Park
description:
【Game Storyline】

The amusement park in the middle of the night is full of strange urban legends.
But when the group chairman's daughter, the Taoist lady, the nun, and the fox-eared girl stand in front of you at the same time to seek help, who will your body honestly choose?As the duty of the beater, you always have to make your own choice. No matter who the outcome is, this will change your life. "Wait, do they all like COSPLAY these days?"

【Game Characters】

[bMiss, the daughter of Chairman of Group A, who has been following her father's business knowledge since she was young, is the future successor of the business empire.[/b]

One of the youngest of the demon fox family, an untouched and spoiled young princess.

She is the excellent demon removal nun, a more frightening presence than the ghosts and monsters.

[/b]There are more mysterious bosses in the amusement park waiting for you to explore.[/b]

【Game Features】

◇All female characters are dubbed in Japanese

◇10 female characters can be navigated

◇29 high-quality dynamic 4K HCG
◇16 story cg
◇One-handed operation for a smooth experience
◇Now supports steamdeck touch screen operation and play
◇Character dressing + character live2d interaction

Welcome to join Discord
